modName: The Kings Hall - Pass Under The Mountain
descriptionHtml:
Over the past few days I have build 2 large extra sections and made some important fixes. For those that have downloaded it and wish to continue playing, the overhauled mod will be available on this site and on the Steam Workshop. I will be removing this mod in due course.

The definitive version is names \'Morsel - The Cursed Halls\' and will be available on here and Steam Workshop.

Apologies to everyone and thanks for supporting me. I felt this was the right thing to do incase the changes messed peoples games up. 

Cheers
Lionbush
author: Lionbush
